name: Anchal Nayak

personalProjects.name: TaskFlow
personalProjects.description: A productivity-focused task management app that allows users to create, organize, and track their tasks efficiently.

freelancingProjects.name: StackNeuro

freelancingProjects.name: ConnexBetter

goals: Become a strong and confident Software Developer
Build real-world projects that solve practical problems
Master core concepts of frontend and backend development
Write clean, optimized, and scalable code
Learn modern tools, frameworks, and best practices
Create impactful digital products and applications
Continuously learn and upgrade skills to stay industry ready

education.description: Pursuing MCA to strengthen advanced programming, software development, system design, and modern IT skills.
Completed a three-year program focused on programming fundamentals, web development, databases, and computer applications.
